name: Little Cigars Spice Islands Filter
additionalNotes: Djarum Bali Hai Filter Little Cigars 10/12 Natural are machine-made little cigars, proudly manufactured in Indonesia since 1951. Called 'kretek' by locals (referring to the crackling 'kretek kretek' sound they make when burning), their unique blend of tobacco and clove offers a satisfying, inimitable experience for the adventurous smoker. Djarum little cigars are offered in an array of blends and flavors.
